location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Plan compiled from the drawings accompanying Major Morton's report on the Karun Irrigation Scheme, dated 23rd August 1907'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 865 x 480mm

mods.abstract: This plan was compiled from the drawings accompanying Major Morton's report on the Karun Irrigation Scheme, and details the path of the Karun River and irrigation sites. Place names are included as location markers along the river. No further details about the places are included.'M.A. Hakimkhan Draftsmanâ€™ is printed in the bottom left hand corner below the neat line.This map was heliozincographed at the Survey of India Office, Calcutta.
